views.markdown:
#### Adobe style (Inverted) theme for iOS

Snowboard and Anemone theme that brings the Adobe Icon style to iOS (Inverted).

[Help support future updates with a donation :)](https://www.paypal.me/zacharyengel)
(Note: if you do choose to donate, please use the "sending to family/friends" option. This avoids PayPal charging me a fee on your donation.)

2.3 contains icons requested by donation.
Please contact me on twitter if you have any requests!

- Added icons for Conexus Banking App, Overwatch League App, Dexter App, CIBC Banking App, DANZ, The Impossible Game, Provenance, Junecloud Deliveries, Movie Times, TV Times, Microsoft RDP, Timer+, NHL, BloonSTD 6, Patreon, Playstation app, Charge, NLL, Filebrowser Biz, Weather Network, Apps Manager (Tigi), UFC, XE Currency, Yahoo Fantasy, Colloquoy, Keybase, FSync(), and RU Mail Cloud.

2.2 is a major update. Please delete previous package and install this package fresh.
Please contact me on twitter if you have any requests!

- Added icons for Apple Frames Shortcut (From Apple Shortcuts app, needs to be added manually to the icon from your theming engine's icon replacement tool), BitTorrent Sync, DoubleU Casino, Google Photo Scanner, Temple Run, Super Mario Run (Alt Icon as well),(Need Liberty Lite Beta from Ryley Angus to play this game on jailbreak), My Talking Tom, Prompt 2, and Prowl
- Added icons and alternate icons for Sileo (Sileo for Electra, Sileo Demo IPA, and Sileo for unc0ver).

2.1 is a small update.
Please contact me on twitter if you have any requests!

- Added icons for Apple Measure App, and Apple Shortcuts App.
- Added Alternate icons for Phone/Dialer, and iFunny.

2.0 Contains a ton of icon requests!
Please contact me on twitter if you have any requests!

- Added icons for 23 and Me, Blizzard Authenticator, Capital One, Deezer, Google Classroom, Hot Schedules, Influenster, Appellancy and Appellancy11, Photomath, Quizlet, Ring Doorbell app, Countdown, State Farm Drive Safe and Save, Clash Royal, SamRemote, TunnelBear VPN, Windscribe VPN, Pro Metronome, and iFunny.

1.9 is a personal update to theme new apps on my personal device.
Please contact me on twitter if you have any requests!

- Added icons for Audible, Streamlabs, Audio Recorder by Limneos, NFCWriterX/XS by Limneos, Holy Bible (YouVersion), ebtEDGE, Starfall, Starfall ABC's, Starfall Learn to Read, Starfall I'm Reading, Starfall Fun to Read, Flappy Bird, and Dr. Suess Treasury.

- Added icon for Cokepoke's iNutt app.
- Added icon for Spectrum TV app.
- Added icon for Great Clip's Online Check-in app.

- Added support for Phoenix JB and a few more requested icons.
- Fixed the BundleID for Firefox.
- Remade the icon for BundleIDsXI.
